title: Payment & Accounting Integrations
challenge: Client needed to sync payments from UrubutoPay and QuickBooks automatically. Manual reconciliation was error‑prone and consumed 15+ hours weekly.
solution: Designed event‑driven pipelines using webhooks and idempotent workers. Built a reconciliation engine that flags mismatches and retries failures. Used PostgreSQL for audit logs.
outcome: Cut reconciliation time by 95%, eliminated manual data entry errors, and processed over 50k transactions in the first quarter.

title: Netpipo Application
challenge: Build a scalable platform from scratch with limited team; needed to balance feature delivery with long‑term maintainability.
solution: Chose Python/React with PostgreSQL, containerised with Docker, Nginx reverse proxy. Implemented CI/CD, automated testing, and modular architecture.
outcome: Launched MVP in 5 months; currently serving 1k+ active users; system uptime 99.9%.

title: On‑Premise Email Server API
challenge: Organisation needed full control over email data, could not use cloud providers. Required programmatic email creation and management.
solution: Set up Postfix + Dovecot on Linux, built Python REST API to manage mailboxes, aliases, and send emails via SMTP. Secured with TLS and API keys.
outcome: Successfully deployed on‑prem, handles 10k+ emails/month, full data sovereignty achieved.

title: Learnpipe — Training Management System
challenge: Needed a custom TMS with course creation, learner progress, and certifications, integrated with existing HR systems.
solution: Full‑stack Next.js with Python backend, PostgreSQL, role‑based access. Built REST APIs for enrolment and progress tracking.
outcome: Reduced administrative overhead by 70%, automated certificate generation.

title: On-Premise Public Server — Self-Hosted Infrastructure
challenge: Required a secure, cost-efficient hosting environment to run web applications and email services independently, without relying on third-party cloud providers.
solution: Deployed and hardened a Linux on-premise server with a public IP. Configured DNS routing, reverse proxy (Nginx), SSL/TLS encryption, firewall rules, and mail services (SMTP/IMAP). Implemented service isolation, monitoring, and secure remote administration.
outcome: Enabled reliable external access to hosted applications and email services, reduced infrastructure costs, and achieved full control over data, security policies, and uptime.

title: Booking Management System
challenge: Manual booking via phone/email caused overbooking and inefficiency.
solution: Built React/Python/MySQL system with real‑time availability, email/SMS confirmations, and admin dashboard.
outcome: Online bookings increased 200%, no double‑bookings since launch.

title: IremboPay Integration
challenge: Integrate government payment gateway (IremboPay) into existing billing system, ensure audit trail and error recovery.
solution: Developed adapter service to translate between IremboPay API and internal system; implemented idempotency and retry logic.
outcome: Processed 5k+ government payments with zero reconciliation issues.

title: Civic Engage — Hackathon App (USSD)
challenge: Create accessible service for citizens with only feature phones (no internet).
solution: USSD app using Africa’s Talking API, Python backend, MySQL for responses. Users could report issues and receive info.
outcome: Won “Most Impactful” award; prototype later piloted with local NGO.
